creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of an old bearded man in a jacket with fur collar and cuffs and a black hat with his head turned slightly to his PL, holding spectacles and a drawing instrument, arm on sheets of paper
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Label

titled in plate i signed and dated in plate, bottom margin: [Ioannes
provenance: [Hermann Wunderlich & Co., New York, no. 53764]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Joannes Lutma Aurifex
